Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Hi, NBWrpgers! This is going to be my last post for about a month, so please 
forgive me if I get behind.

       A blinding flash of light breaks the Australian night. A rainbow 
energy hits a plateau. Something takes form within the swirling energy. Beta 
1 activates his genetic scanner. The rainbow energy stops. A wolf howls as 
the scanner beam passes over it. Beta 1 mutates, and transforms into his new 
TM2 Wolf form. His eyes are closed, and the mysterious energy circles over 
his head. The energy streaks across space, into the cosmos...
 "Primus, I have reached the earth..."

--part1_6b.f669aa0.27adf682_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
